title: Two-Sum Problem
question: The sum input should also be a sum of any two elements in the array.
sample:
Sum = 10 in a set of [1, 3, 6, 7, 7, 12, 14] should return true because 3 +7 = 10. 
Sum = 12 in a set of [1, 3, 6, 7, 7, 12, 14] should return false because none of the elements add up to 12.
answer: var lowIndex = 0 var highIndex = array.count - 1 while lowIndex < highIndex {   let sumOfItems = array[lowIndex] + array[highIndex]   if sumOfItems == sum {     return true   } else if sumOfItems < sum {     lowIndex += 1   } else if sumOfItems > sum {     highIndex -= 1   } } return false
